entry.title: emberjs/data: WarpDrive is a lightweight data library for web apps — universal, typed, reactive, and ready to scale.
entry.content: WarpDrive is a lightweight data library for web apps — universal, typed, reactive, and ready to scale.

entry.title: CyberlordSY/GetMusic-Lite: GetMusic-Lite is a simple, frontend-only music website featuring a sleek dark theme, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users can play, pause, and control music through interactive buttons. Designed for speed and ease of use, it requires no backend, making it ideal for personal projects, learning, or lightweight browser-based music playback.
entry.content: GetMusic-Lite is a simple, frontend-only music website featuring a sleek dark theme, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Users can play, pause, and control music through interactive buttons. Designed for speed and ease of use, it requires no backend, making it ideal for personal projects, learning, or lightweight browser-based music playback.

entry.title: HimanshuKumar101/tic_tac_toe_Game: A fun and lightweight Tic-Tac-Toe project, demonstrating basic game logic with JavaScript. Features include real-time updates, win detection, and reset functionality.
entry.content: A fun and lightweight Tic-Tac-Toe project, demonstrating basic game logic with JavaScript. Features include real-time updates, win detection, and reset functionality.

entry.title: skrijwan100/simple-auth-kit: A lightweight and reusable authentication package for Node.js projects using MongoDB, JWT, and bcrypt. Just connect your MongoDB URI and you're ready to register or login users with a few lines of code.
entry.content: A lightweight and reusable authentication package for Node.js projects using MongoDB, JWT, and bcrypt. Just connect your MongoDB URI and you're ready to register or login users with a few lines of code.

entry.title: yuvi3008/sfmc-react-tailwind-starter: This repo is a starter template to build, style, and deploy lightweight React apps to Salesforce Marketing Cloud CloudPages. It uses Vite for blazing-fast builds and Tailwind CSS for responsive styling. Built assets are deployed via SFMC Code Resources and embedded into CloudPages. This repo uses API hosted on code resource and written on SSJS.
entry.content: This repo is a starter template to build, style, and deploy lightweight React apps to Salesforce Marketing Cloud CloudPages. It uses Vite for blazing-fast builds and Tailwind CSS for responsive styling. Built assets are deployed via SFMC Code Resources and embedded into CloudPages. This repo uses API hosted on code resource and written on SSJS.

entry.title: MuzamilChouhan/Fiverr-X-Reloader-Auto-Refresh-Tool-for-Fiverr-Sellers: Fiverr X Reloader is a lightweight, React-based auto-refresh tool for Fiverr sellers. It keeps your Fiverr dashboard active 24/7 with randomized refresh intervals, a live countdown timer, and a sleek, mobile-optimized UI. Perfect for boosting online presence and productivity on Fiverr.
entry.content: Fiverr X Reloader is a lightweight, React-based auto-refresh tool for Fiverr sellers. It keeps your Fiverr dashboard active 24/7 with randomized refresh intervals, a live countdown timer, and a sleek, mobile-optimized UI. Perfect for boosting online presence and productivity on Fiverr.

entry.title: Marmik-Soni/to-do-list-backend-assessment: A lightweight RESTful API built with Node.js and Express.js for managing tasks. Supports full CRUD operations, in-memory data storage, input validation, and proper error handling. Ideal for learning or prototyping task management systems.
entry.content: A lightweight RESTful API built with Node.js and Express.js for managing tasks. Supports full CRUD operations, in-memory data storage, input validation, and proper error handling. Ideal for learning or prototyping task management systems.
